name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.unit_ext
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasTerminal C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts C
X : C
f g : Quiver.Hom X CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorUnit
⊢ Eq f g
decl: @[ext] theorem unit_ext {X : C} (f g : X ⟶ 𝟙_ C) : f = g := terminal.hom_ext f g

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.unit_ext_iff
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C

inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts C
X : C
f g : Quiver.Hom X CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorUnit
⊢ Iff (Eq f g) True
decl: @[ext] theorem unit_ext {X : C} (f g : X ⟶ 𝟙_ C) : f = g := terminal.hom_ext f g

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.tensor_ext
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasTerminal C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts C
X Y Z : C
f g : Quiver.Hom X (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj Y Z)
w₁ : Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.fst) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.fst)
w₂ : Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.snd) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.snd)
⊢ Eq f g
decl:
@[ext] theorem tensor_ext {X Y Z : C} (f g : X ⟶ Y ⊗ Z)
    (w₁ : f ≫ prod.fst = g ≫ prod.fst) (w₂ : f ≫ prod.snd = g ≫ prod.snd) : f = g :=
  Limits.prod.hom_ext w₁ w₂

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.tensor_ext_iff
initialProofState:

inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts C

f g : Quiver.Hom X (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj Y Z)
⊢ Iff (Eq f g) (And (Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.fst) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.fst)) (Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.snd) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.snd)))
decl:
@[ext] theorem tensor_ext {X Y Z : C} (f g : X ⟶ Y ⊗ Z)

  Limits.prod.hom_ext w₁ w₂

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.rightUnitor_inv
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C

decl:

-- We don't mark this as a simp lemma, even though in many particular
-- categories the right hand side will simplify significantly further.
-- For now, we'll plan to create specialised simp lemmas in each particular category.

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.associator_hom
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasTerminal C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts C
X Y Z : C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator X Y Z).hom (CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.lift (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.fst CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.fst) (CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.lift (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.fst CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.snd) CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.snd))
decl:
theorem associator_hom (X Y Z : C) :
    (α_ X Y Z).hom =
      prod.lift (Limits.prod.fst ≫ Limits.prod.fst)
        (prod.lift (Limits.prod.fst ≫ Limits.prod.snd) Limits.prod.snd) :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.associator_inv
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasTerminal C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts C
X Y Z : C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator X Y Z).inv (CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.lift (CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.lift CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.fst (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.snd CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.fst)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.snd CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.snd))
decl:
theorem associator_inv (X Y Z : C) :
    (α_ X Y Z).inv =
      prod.lift (prod.lift prod.fst (prod.snd ≫ prod.fst)) (prod.snd ≫ prod.snd) :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.associator_hom_fst
initialProofState:

inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts C

decl:
@[reassoc] theorem associator_hom_fst (X Y Z : C) :
    (α_ X Y Z).hom ≫ prod.fst = prod.fst ≫ prod.fst := by simp [associator_hom]

name: CategoryTheory.symmetricOfHasFiniteProducts_braiding
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasTerminal C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts C
X Y : C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.BraidedCategory.braiding X Y) (CategoryTheory.Limits.prod.braiding X Y)
decl:
/-- The monoidal structure coming from finite products is symmetric.
-/
@[simps]
def symmetricOfHasFiniteProducts [HasTerminal C] [HasBinaryProducts C] : SymmetricCategory C where
  braiding X Y := Limits.prod.braiding X Y
  braiding_naturality_left f X := by simp
  braiding_naturality_right X _ _ f := by simp
  hexagon_forward X Y Z := by dsimp [monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.associator_hom]; simp
  hexagon_reverse X Y Z := by dsimp [monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.associator_inv]; simp
  symmetry X Y := by dsimp; simp

⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj X Y) (CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod X Y)

theorem tensorObj (X Y : C) : X ⊗ Y = (X ⨿ Y) :=
  rfl

theorem rightUnitor_hom (X : C) : (ρ_ X).hom = coprod.desc (𝟙 _) (initial.to X) :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteCoproducts.leftUnitor_inv
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasInitial C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryCoproducts C
X : C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.leftUnitor X).inv CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inr
decl:
@[simp]
theorem leftUnitor_inv (X : C) : (λ_ X).inv = Limits.coprod.inr :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteCoproducts.rightUnitor_inv
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasInitial C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryCoproducts C
X : C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.rightUnitor X).inv CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inl
decl:
@[simp]
theorem rightUnitor_inv (X : C) : (ρ_ X).inv = Limits.coprod.inl :=
  rfl

-- We don't mark this as a simp lemma, even though in many particular
-- categories the right hand side will simplify significantly further.
-- For now, we'll plan to create specialised simp lemmas in each particular category.

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteCoproducts.associator_hom
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasInitial C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryCoproducts C
X Y Z : C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator X Y Z).hom (CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.desc (CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.desc CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inl (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inl CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inr)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inr CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inr))
decl:
theorem associator_hom (X Y Z : C) :
    (α_ X Y Z).hom =
      coprod.desc (coprod.desc coprod.inl (coprod.inl ≫ coprod.inr)) (coprod.inr ≫ coprod.inr) :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteCoproducts.associator_inv
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasInitial C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryCoproducts C
X Y Z : C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator X Y Z).inv (CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.desc (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inl CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inl) (CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.desc (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inr CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inl) CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.inr))
decl:
theorem associator_inv (X Y Z : C) :
    (α_ X Y Z).inv =
      coprod.desc (coprod.inl ≫ coprod.inl) (coprod.desc (coprod.inr ≫ coprod.inl) coprod.inr) :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.symmetricOfHasFiniteCoproducts_braiding
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasInitial C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryCoproducts C
P Q : C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.BraidedCategory.braiding P Q) (CategoryTheory.Limits.coprod.braiding P Q)
decl:
/-- The monoidal structure coming from finite coproducts is symmetric.
-/
@[simps]
def symmetricOfHasFiniteCoproducts [HasInitial C] [HasBinaryCoproducts C] :
    SymmetricCategory C where
  braiding := Limits.coprod.braiding
  braiding_naturality_left f g := by simp
  braiding_naturality_right f g := by simp
  hexagon_forward X Y Z := by dsimp [monoidalOfHasFiniteCoproducts.associator_hom]; simp
  hexagon_reverse X Y Z := by dsimp [monoidalOfHasFiniteCoproducts.associator_inv]; simp
  symmetry X Y := by dsimp; simp

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.η_eq
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝⁵ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
D : Type u_1
inst✝⁴ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} D
F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasTerminal C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasTerminal D
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts D
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.Functor.OplaxMonoidal.η F) (CategoryTheory.Limits.terminalComparison F)
decl: lemma η_eq : η F = terminalComparison F := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts.δ_eq
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝⁵ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
D : Type u_1

F : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst✝³ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasTerminal C
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasTerminal D
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts D
X Y : C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.Functor.OplaxMonoidal.δ F X Y) (CategoryTheory.Limits.prodComparison F X Y)
decl: lemma δ_eq (X Y : C) : δ F X Y = prodComparison F X Y := rfl

initialProofState:

D : Type u_1

inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasBinaryProducts D
⊢ CategoryTheory.IsIso (CategoryTheory.Functor.OplaxMonoidal.η F)
decl: instance : IsIso (η F) := by dsimp [η_eq]; infer_instance
